      • getName

        protected void getName(ActionEvent event)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       java.sql.SQLException
        Gets the name of the table (e.g. 1, 2, 3). Method to link with the OrderPopup view and create a popup, showing the name of the table selected. Takes the source data as a String, by getting the right characters when pressed on the button

        If there is an order at the table -> jump to Edit order screen and send order number / table number

        If no order -> jumps to Create an order screen and send order number / table number

        Parameters:
        event - the event
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception

      • activeTables

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> activeTables()
                                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Active tables
        Returns:
        the array list of the tables that has 1(true) in the database (have orders)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception

      • HighlightDish

        protected java.lang.String HighlightDish()
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Highlight dish. Provide quick Analytics on the most popular food item

        Selects the dish that has the highest count in the database (appears most often)

        Returns:
        the string (dish name)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception

        protected java.lang.String HighlightOrders()

        the order number as a String
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception

      • HighlightSum

        protected java.lang.String HighlightSum()
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Highlight sum. Gets the total money earned in this month.

        Takes the current date, get the month characters and filters the database query (total sum of bills in this month)

        Returns:
        the sum of the bills as a String
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception
